<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following fixups handle the ARM BL instructions. These can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditionalised; however, the ARM ELF ABI requires a different relocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in that case: R&#95;ARM&#95;JUMP24 instead of R&#95;ARM&#95;CALL. The difference is that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R&#95;ARM&#95;CALL is allowed to change the instruction to a BLX inline, which has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no conditional version; R&#95;ARM&#95;JUMP24 would have to insert a veneer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MachO does not draw a distinction between the two cases, so it will treat</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixup&#95;arm&#95;uncondbl and fixup&#95;arm&#95;condbl as identical fixups.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixup for unconditional ARM BL instructions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The next two are for the movt/movw pair</span></CodeLine>
